title: ggalllow
author: ggalllow
created_time: August 27, 2022, 04:11:33 PMLast edit: August 27, 2022, 05:19:04 PM by ggalllow

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: You started with Roobet, I checked Roobet ToS, this is what I saw:https://roobet.com/termsandconditionsQuote from: https://roobet.com/termsandconditionsYou may not sell your account on the website or anything related to the account to another natural person or legal entity. If you give, sell, borrow, lend or hand over your account or anything connected to your account in any way to someone else, your account will be immediately frozen. All your Roobidos will be indefinitely frozen in your Roobido-safe. Your account is given to you for personal usage to chat with other users and to non-professionally take part in games of risk, games of chance, and games of skill. Your access to the services on the website is granted non- exclusive and non-transferable.If I check other gambling sites, I would likely see something related to this, and also related to customers not to use VPN. Buying and selling of gambling site account is against gambling site ToS.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Did you just read the reply from Oshosondy?. I think you don't mind to buy an account that is very risky to use because if roobet detects that it is a bought account then it will surely be frozen and a frozen balance in an account is not playable or in short it is useless to have an account that is frozen. Why not just create an account to avoid such situation rather than buying which is very risky.Quote from: jocash777 on August 27, 2022, 04:40:05 PMCan you send here or via PM your email? I have accounts you are looking for. It's still risky for the buyer. I'd suggest op to not buy.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: ggalllow on August 27, 2022, 04:11:33 PM.Is the casino account not linked to the user's email, as far as we know, the settings do not allow you to change your email, so what's the point of a casino account without access to email, unless registration was made to a clean email address.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on August 27, 2022, 04:30:44 PM<snip>I wonder how will the be able to tell if the account was bought or not. Like, if the account hasn't been undergone into any KYC process, how and when can they tell?I am against to casino account buying, but I don't get exactly the specific reasons why it is currently prohibited to most casinos (If not all).

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: My guess is that op already contacted josh777 to negotiate the account since the post made by jocash777 is now deleted but I manage to quote the post and op is also edited. I also checked using bpip.org and found out that it isn't deleted by mod but the information might be not up to date yet so, i'm not sure if what I know is what accurate.

comments.author: Saint-loup
comments.body: Quote from: Eureka_07 on August 27, 2022, 05:29:48 PMQuote from: Oshosondy on August 27, 2022, 04:30:44 PM<snip>I wonder how will the be able to tell if the account was bought or not. Like, if the account hasn't been undergone into any KYC process, how and when can they tell?I am against to casino account buying, but I don't get exactly the specific reasons why it is currently prohibited to most casinos (If not all). I agree with you if not any KYC had been completed, the casino won't be able to lock the account except if the former owner reports a hack and can prove his ownership with emails or crypto addresses he has used for example. But why someone would buy an account without KYC instead of creating one himself? An account with a KYC already fulfilled is risky because if the casino asks proofs one day the buyer won't be able to give them, but it could be the only solution for people banned from a casino because of their location or because of individual restrictions.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Quote from: jocash777 on August 27, 2022, 09:08:33 PMI deleted my post because i did not want sell any accounts, that idiot did not contact me.I dont even have any accounts for sale i just wanted to take money and not send any account hahahahaha. That's an honest answer which you want to scam op by so called selling account. You may get red tagged that way even though nothing happened between you two.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: jocash777 on August 27, 2022, 09:08:33 PMQuote from: nakamura12 on August 27, 2022, 08:42:51 PMMy guess is that op already contacted josh777 to negotiate the account since the post made by jocash777 is now deleted but I manage to quote the post and op is also edited. I also checked using bpip.org and found out that it isn't deleted by mod but the information might be not up to date yet so, i'm not sure if what I know is what accurate.I deleted my post because i did not want sell any accounts, that idiot did not contact me.I dont even have any accounts for sale i just wanted to take money and not send any account hahahahaha.^ So possible you are attempting to scam?Do you want to take advantage of the money and once you have it you will never give the account? Is that what you meant?Just wait for it it will probably there will someone who left you a negative tag in your profile because of this behavior.That is why it is not ideal to buy an account, it is risky for the buyer and I think only an idiot person will do this because everyone could make an account not unless your country banned the casino.

comments.author: GigaBit
comments.body: Quote from: Daltonik on August 27, 2022, 05:23:16 PMQuote from: ggalllow on August 27, 2022, 04:11:33 PM.Is the casino account not linked to the user's email, as far as we know, the settings do not allow you to change your email, so what's the point of a casino account without access to email, unless registration was made to a clean email address.However, purchasing such an account is illegal. which should not be allowed. But if someone does that illegal work then he must take the email access of that account. Otherwise it is true that he will lose his account at any time. As soon as possible after purchasing the account, should be reset the security pass code of that particular email account.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: You will learn in a terrible way when your money is frozen in a bought casino account.The reason to buy an account is to avoid KYC but most casinos today will once again ask the KYC to verify again. This will cause you trouble and probably will let this seller access the account to verify, funds are at the mercy of this seller and you don't want that.
